record.creatorArchitect2: Jackson, Emery B., Alvin Meyer and J. M. Jonson
record.description: A group contribution to the Red Cross for relief to war refugees was made at the International House at the University of Chicago. Mrs. James H. Goodman receives the gifts of (left to right) N. Shibata, Japan; Audrey Collinson, England; Herbert Gross, Chicago; Elizabeth Lewis, Canada, and Yi-Hsien-Hu of Chicago's Chinese Colony.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Attached news clipping, paint on the surface.
